description: Demolition of existing two-storey block, and construction of five-storey residential building, accommodating 44 new council homes - comprising 17 x 1-bed homes, 16 x 2-bed homes, 9 x 3-bed homes and 2 x 4-bed homes - and new landscape courtyard.

open_spaces_details.description: new courtyard amenity for public use

open_spaces_details.open_space_type: Provision for children and young people
